stage1.header: Install and run one of the relic scanner options:

reliquarydesc.title: (Recommended) IceDynamix Reliquary Archiver
reliquarydesc.onlinemsg: Status: Updated for patch 2.4, new download required for March 7th support
reliquarydesc.offlinemsg: ***** Status: Down for maintenance after 2.4 patch *****
reliquarydesc.l2: Imports full inventory and character roster

kelzdesc.title: Kel-Z HSR Scanner
kelzdesc.l1: Inaccurate speed decimals, 5-10 minutes OCR scan
kelzdesc.l2: Imports full inventory and character roster

scorerdesc.title: Relic Scorer Import
scorerdesc.l2: No download needed, but limited to relics from the 8 characters on profile showcase

hoyolabdesc.title: HoyoLab Import
hoyolabdesc.l2: No download needed, but limited to ingame characters' equipped relics

stage2.norelics: Invalid scanner file, please try a different file

relicsimport.label: Import $t(common:relic, {"count": 123, "length": 0}) only. Updates the optimizer with the new dataset of $t(common:relic, {"count": 123, "length": 0}) and doesn't overwrite builds.

charactersimport.label: Import $t(common:relic, {"count": 123, "length": 0}) only. Updates the optimizer with the new dataset of $t(common:relic, {"count": 123, "length": 0}) and doesn't overwrite builds.
charactersimport.warningdescription: Are you sure you want to overwrite your optimizer builds with ingame builds?

stage1.label: Load your optimizer data from a file.

stage2.errormsg: Invalid save file, please try a different file. Did you mean to use the "$t(tablabels.import)" tab?
stage2.label: File contains $t(common:relicWithCount, {"count": {{reliccount}} }) and $t(common:characterWithCount, {"count": {{charactercount}} }). Replace your current data with the uploaded data?

savedata.label: Save your optimizer data to a file.

cleardata.label: Clear all optimizer data.
cleardata.warningdescription: Are you sure you want to clear all relics and characters?
